Warm-up.name: Yuri's Shoulder Band Warmup
Warm-up.description: Use a resistance band to warm up your shoulders with various movements.

Warm-up.name: Squat Sky Reaches
Warm-up.description: Perform a deep squat while reaching your arms overhead.

Warm-up.name: GMB Wrist Prep
Warm-up.description: Perform various wrist mobility exercises to prepare for bodyweight training.

Warm-up.name: Dead Bugs
Warm-up.description: Lie on your back and alternate extending opposite arm and leg while maintaining core tension.

Warm-up.name: Arch Hangs
Warm-up.description: Hang from a bar and pull your shoulder blades down and back.

Warm-up.name: Support Hold
Warm-up.description: Hold yourself up on parallel bars or the edge of counters/chairs.

Strength Work - First Pair.name: Pull-up Progression
Strength Work - First Pair.description: Choose from scapular pulls, arch hangs, negative pull-ups, pull-ups, weighted pull-ups.

Strength Work - First Pair.name: Squat Progression
Strength Work - First Pair.description: Choose from assisted squat, squat, split squat, shrimp squat, weighted squat.

Strength Work - Second Pair.name: Dip Progression
Strength Work - Second Pair.description: Choose from parallel bar support hold, negative dips, parallel bar dips, weighted dips.

Strength Work - Second Pair.name: Hinge Progression
Strength Work - Second Pair.description: Choose from Romanian deadlift, single-legged deadlift, banded Nordic curl, Nordic curl.

Strength Work - Third Pair.name: Row Progression
Strength Work - Third Pair.description: Choose from vertical rows, incline rows, horizontal rows, weighted rows.

Strength Work - Third Pair.name: Push-up Progression
Strength Work - Third Pair.description: Choose from vertical push-up, incline push-up, full push-up, diamond push-up, pseudo planche push-up.

Core Triplet.name: Anti-Extension
Core Triplet.description: Choose from plank, ring ab rollout.

Core Triplet.name: Anti-Rotation
Core Triplet.description: Choose from banded pallof press or similar exercises.

Core Triplet.name: Extension
Core Triplet.description: Choose from reverse hyperextension, arch raises, superman.
